thread.title: MR ARTHUR TURNER
thread.title_full: Amigo Loans reviewed by MR ARTHUR TURNER

author: MR ARTHUR TURNER
title: MR ARTHUR TURNER
text:
I was so impressed by your professionalism how friendly you all were and how you understood my situation. The process was a bit long winded re guarantor but fortunately we were together so we're able to complete things in one phone call. It was good that we received messages and correspondence by SMS and email. It was a genuine process that didn't make you feel a bad person for asking for a loan in the first place!
I can't thank you all enough.
Thank You
All of you!!!!
